verses.verse: וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi used כָל־ <WH3605> chol now the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz And the whole earth שָׂפָ֣ה <WH8193> sa-Fah language אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> 'e-Chat; was of one וּדְבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> u-de-va-Rim speech אֲחָדִֽים׃ <WH259> 'a-cha-Dim. and of one

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בְּנָסְעָ֣ם <WH5265> be-na-se-'Am And it came to pass as they journeyed מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem; from the east וַֽיִּמְצְא֥וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tze-'U that they found בִקְעָ֛ה <WH1237> vik-'Ah a plain בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <WH8152> shin-'Ar of Shinar וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> vai-Ye-she-vu and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu, to another הָ֚בָה <WH3051> Ha-vah Go to נִלְבְּנָ֣ה <WH3835> nil-be-Nah let us make לְבֵנִ֔ים <WH3843> le-ve-Nim, brick וְנִשְׂרְפָ֖ה <WH8313> ve-nis-re-Fah and burn לִשְׂרֵפָ֑ה <WH8316> lis-re-Fah; them throughly וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi had לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem הַלְּבֵנָה֙ <WH3843> hal-le-ve-Nah And they had brick לְאָ֔בֶן <WH68> le-'A-ven, for stone וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ר <WH2564> ve-Ha-che-Mar, and slime הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah used לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לַחֹֽמֶר׃ <WH2563> la-Cho-mer. they for morter

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said הָ֣בָה׀ <WH3051> Ha-vah Go to נִבְנֶה־ <WH1129> niv-neh- let us build לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עִ֗יר <WH5892> 'Ir, us a city וּמִגְדָּל֙ <WH4026> u-mig-Dal and a tower וְרֹאשׁ֣וֹ <WH7218> ve-ro-Sho whose top בַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> vash-sha-Ma-yim, [may reach] unto heaven וְנַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ve-na-'a-seh- and let us make לָּ֖נוּ La-nu שֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> Shem; us a name פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- otherwise נָפ֖וּץ <WH6327> na-Futz lest we be scattered abroad עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon the face כָל־ <WH3605> chol of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth

וַיֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red came down יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD לִרְאֹ֥ת <WH7200> lir-'Ot to see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמִּגְדָּ֑ל <WH4026> ham-mig-Dal; and the tower אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּנ֖וּ <WH1129> ba-Nu builded בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei which the children הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> ha-'a-Dam. of men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD הֵ֣ן <WH2005> hen Behold עַ֤ם <WH5971> 'am Behold the people אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad [is] one וְשָׂפָ֤ה <WH8193> ve-sa-Fah language אַחַת֙ <WH259> 'a-Chat and they have all one לְכֻלָּ֔ם <WH3605> le-chul-Lam, all וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh and this הַחִלָּ֣ם <WH2490> ha-chil-Lam and this they begin לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot; to do וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִבָּצֵ֣ר <WH1219> yib-ba-Tzer will be restrained מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> me-Hem, and they כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָזְמ֖וּ <WH2161> ya-ze-Mu from them which they have imagined לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> La-'a-Sot. to do
